SELECT R.no,R.member_id,R.sr_no,R.chat_content,r.send_date,L.vaild_yn
FROM (SELECT rownum r , c.* FROM chatting c ) R left outer join (select * from report_log where content_category='C') L on R.no = L.content_id WHERE sr_no = #{roomNo} and R.no BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo} order by R.no desc
